testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and "tester".........................passed When user enter date of birth...............................................passed And user enter email "testh9@example.com"...................................passed When user fills Password fields.............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login "testh9@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".........................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..........................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03 | Change Currency to EURO and apply for all products
testcase.name: Select Euro currency from the list on the top left of home page
testcase.system-out: When user select EURO from list.............................................passed Then All produucts soould be displayed with Euro Symbol.....................passed

testcase.system-out: When User clicks on search field...........................................passed And Search with "book"......................................................passed Then User could find "book" relative results................................passed
